definitions.definition: To run away from home with a paramour .
labels: of a married or engaged person
definitions.label_groups: intransitive , of a married or engaged person

definitions.definition: To run away secretly for the purpose of getting married with one's intended spouse ; to marry in a quick or private fashion , especially without a public period of engagement .
To run away from home (for any reason).

main_definition: ( intransitive , of a married or engaged person ) To run away from home with a paramour .
secondary_definitions: ( intransitive , of an unmarried person ) To run away secretly for the purpose of getting married with one's intended spouse ; to marry in a quick or private fashion , especially without a public period of engagement .
( intransitive , dated ) To run away from home (for any reason).
